text: Ali Amrozi bin Haji Nurhasyim (also known as Amrozi; 5 July 1962 - 9 November 2008) was an Indonesian who was convicted for his part in the 2002 Bali terrorist bombing. He was executed along with two other men involved in the bombing in early November 2008. Ali was executed on November 9 by a firing squad. Category:1962 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Indonesian criminals Category:Islamist insurgents Category:People executed by firearm
title: Amrozi bin Nurhasyim
